course_description: This course investigates the scope and meaning of race equality, sex equality, and implied fundamental rights under the Reconstruction Amendments. We pay particular attention to the historical development of the Fourteenth Amendment's liberty and equality guarantees and to contemporary constitutional controversies including affirmative action, same-sex marriage, and abortion.
